graph_title: Proportion of local governments that adopt and implement local disaster risk reduction strategies in line with national disaster risk reduction strategies

target_name:
Ambition - Canadians reduce their GHG emissions
Target - By 2030, reduce Canada's total greenhouse gas emissions by 30%, relative to 2005 emission levels; By 2050, achieve net-zero emissions.
